overview:
## Discussion

Each data item in the same type group must have a unique identifier. Assign any other JSON object keys to the data item after it has been created. [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/dataitem/2897826-dataitem#2902593] shows JSON objects being mapped to data items. The `url` and `title` keys and values are added to each data item after creation.
title: DataItem
